com.company.Combat
Class Attack

java.lang.Object
  com.company.Combat.Attack

public class Attack
extends java.lang.Object

The Attack-class defines an attack, and contains properties for damage and maybe a number of effects.

Constructor Summary

          Designated Constructor for an Attack.
 
Method Summary
 float getDamage()
          Returns the damage dealt by the attack.
 boolean getWillStun()
          Returns a boolean value determining if the attack has a chance to stun.

Constructor Detail

Attack

public Attack(float damage,
              boolean stun)
Designated Constructor for an Attack.

Parameters:
damage - The damage the attacks deals.
stun - A boolean value determining if the attack has a chance to stun the opponent.
Method Detail

getDamage

public float getDamage()
Returns the damage dealt by the attack.

Returns:
A float-value representing the amount of damage dealt.

getWillStun

public boolean getWillStun()
Returns a boolean value determining if the attack has a chance to stun.

Returns:
True if the opponent has a chance to be stunned, or false.
